entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor issue with routing and - separator #49691
  • type or namespace 'App' could not be found #49690
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49688
  • Blazor hosted wasm dependent assembly loading issue in 7.0.9 #49685
  • Blazor TempData #49683
  • IEmailSender exists in both 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI' and 'Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Core' #49681
  • SSR/server interactivity Error Boundary not working with Blazor Web App Pre6 #49679
    8.0-rc1
  • Add Blazor SSR css stylesheet link append-version component #49678
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_UseOfColor: Only color is used for "About" link and underline is not provided. #49676
    8.0-rc1
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.7.23375.2] The requested service 'Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IStartupValidator' has not been registered error shows when trying to resolve dependency in application forum. #49675
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #49673
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mapaction, plaintext #49672
  • Perf improvement: single_query #49671
  • NavigationManager doesn't navigate relative to the base address when using Blazor SSR #49670
    8.0-rc1
  • ASP.NET Core Identity Documentation and samples #49668
    8.0-rc2

Closed

  • Add reset password support to identity endpoints #47231
    8.0-preview7
  • openidconnect infinite redirect loop #49686
  • sourcelink dependency is out of date #48455
    8.0
  • AddIdentityBearerToken should not be generic #49404
    8.0-preview7
  • Support changing username and email using identity endpoints #47229
    8.0-preview7
  • Add 2fa support to token identity endpoints #47230
    8.0-preview7
  • Support account lockout with identity endpoints #47232
    8.0-preview7
  • Custom claims lost after sometime in AspNetCore Identity cookie #49610
  • Specific culture dateTime formatting were different in local and azure server hosting #49652
  • Perf improvement: json #49659

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BindAsync and misc bugs in RDG #49693
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix MinimalFormSample location in sln #49692
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky tests CanCacheRouteTable #49680
    area-blazor
  • Update EndpointDataSource.cs #49674
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23374.2 #49470
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Update milestones for September servicing #49689
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove SourceLink dependency #49687
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49498
    area-identity, 8.0-rc1
  • Move System.Drawing.Common to ToolsetDependencies #49684
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove unwanted items from SharedFx RuntimeConfig #49682
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Avoid allocating a new SystemClock in each AuthenticationHandler #49667
    area-security, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove unnecessary string[] allocation from AuthenticationTokenExtens… #49669
    area-security, area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2230741 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Remove duplicate checks on path in test #49648
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve MVC and RazorPages debugging #49353
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] SSR unified routing #49622
    area-blazor
